sw-color-brand-primary.label: Primary colour
sw-color-brand-primary.helpText:
Select the primary colour for your shop.

This does not necessarily have to be your corporate colour if it does not provide sufficient contrast or harmonise with the design.

sw-color-brand-secondary.label: Secondary colour
sw-color-brand-secondary.helpText: Select the secondary colour for your shop.

sw-border-color.label: Border colour
sw-border-color.helpText: Select the border colour for elements in your shop.

sw-background-color.label: Background colour
sw-background-color.helpText: Select the background colour for your shop.

ft-background-color.label: Background colour
ft-background-color.helpText:
Select the background colour for colour accents in your shop.

Tip: This should be a very light colour to ensure sufficient contrast with the text colour.

sw-font-family-base.label: Text font
sw-font-family-base.helpText:
Enter the font family for body text.

You can choose between 'Inter' and 'Sen'.

sw-text-color.label: Text colour
sw-text-color.helpText: Select the colour for body text.

sw-font-family-headline.label: Headline font
sw-font-family-headline.helpText:
Enter the font family for headlines.

You can choose between 'Inter' and 'Sen'.

ft-link-color.label: Link colour
ft-link-color.helpText: Select the colour for links in body text.

ft-link-color-hover.label: Link colour (Hover)
ft-link-color-hover.helpText: Select the colour for links in body text when hovering over them.

ft-icon-set.label: Icon set
ft-icon-set.helpText:
Select your preferred icon set.

You can choose between 'Default' and 'Feather' icons.

sw-logo-desktop.label: Desktop
sw-logo-desktop.helpText: Displayed on viewports above 991px and as a fallback on smaller viewports, if no other logo is set.

ft-header-layout-type.label: Layout type
ft-header-layout-type.helpText:
Select your preferred layout type for the header.

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, choose the 'Standard' layout.

ft-top-bar-layout-type.label: Layout type
ft-top-bar-layout-type.helpText:
Select your preferred layout type for the top bar.

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, choose the 'Standard' layout.

ft-top-bar-color.label: Text colour
ft-top-bar-color.helpText:
Select the text colour for the top bar.

Tip: Make sure the text colour has enough contrast with the background colour.

ft-top-bar-background-color.label: Background colour
ft-top-bar-background-color.helpText: Select the background colour for the top bar.

ft-top-bar-column-1.label: Column 1
ft-top-bar-column-1.helpText:
Select the content of column 1.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Top Bar'".

ft-top-bar-column-2.label: Column 2
ft-top-bar-column-2.helpText:
Select the content of column 2.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Top Bar'".

ft-top-bar-column-3.label: Column 3
ft-top-bar-column-3.helpText:
Select the content of column 3.

Tip: The language/currency selection is shown if you have configured more than one language or currency in your Sales Channel.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Top Bar'".

ft-snippet-field-mail.label: Contact: Email
ft-snippet-field-mail.helpText: Enter the email address for the contact element.

ft-snippet-field-phone.label: Contact: Phone
ft-snippet-field-phone.helpText: Enter the phone number for the contact element.

ft-footer-layout-type.label: Layout type
ft-footer-layout-type.helpText:
Select your preferred layout type for the footer.

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, choose the 'Standard' layout.

ft-footer-color.label: Text colour
ft-footer-color.helpText:
Select the text colour for the footer.

Tip: Make sure the text colour has enough contrast with the background colour.

ft-footer-background-color.label: Background colour
ft-footer-background-color.helpText: Select the background colour for the footer.

ft-footer-link-color.label: Link colour
ft-footer-link-color.helpText:
Select the colour for links in the footer.

Tip: Make sure the link colour has enough contrast with the background colour.

ft-footer-link-color-hover.label: Link colour (Hover)
ft-footer-link-color-hover.helpText: Select the colour for links in the footer when hovering over them.

ft-footer-logo.label: Footer logo
ft-footer-logo.helpText:
Select the logo for the footer.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Footer'".

ft-footer-social-icons-show.label: Show social icons
ft-footer-social-icons-show.helpText: Select whether the social icons should be displayed in the 'Contact' section of the footer.

ft-footer-navigation-columns.label: Columns
ft-footer-navigation-columns.helpText: Select the number of columns for the footer navigation.

ft-footer-newsletter-show.label: Show footer newsletter
ft-footer-newsletter-show.helpText:
Select whether the "FreeTheme 'Footer Newsletter'" subscription should be displayed above the footer.

Note: Assign your 'layout for newsletter pages' in the Shopware settings (Settings > General > Basic information) so that registration can be opened.

ft-footer-newsletter-color.label: Text colour
ft-footer-newsletter-color.helpText:
Select the text colour for the footer newsletter.

Tip: Make sure the text colour has enough contrast with the background colour.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Footer Newsletter'".

ft-footer-newsletter-background-color.label: Background colour
ft-footer-newsletter-background-color.helpText:
Select the background colour for the footer newsletter.

Note: This configuration refers to the "FreeTheme 'Footer Newsletter'".

ft-snippet-field-payment-shipping-headli.label: Payment and Shipping Headline
ft-snippet-field-payment-shipping-headli.helpText: Enter the headline for the payment and shipping logos in the footer.

ft-branding-lizenzkey.label: License key for branding removal
ft-branding-lizenzkey.helpText: If you would like to remove the FreeTheme Branding, you can purchase a licence from us. If you are interested, please contact us at: https://shopware-free-theme.de/.

ft-sidebar-navigation-headline-show.label: Show headline
ft-sidebar-navigation-headline-show.helpText: Select whether the headline for the sidebar navigation should be displayed.

ft-sidebar-filter-headline-show.label: Show headline
ft-sidebar-filter-headline-show.helpText: Select whether the headline for the sidebar filter should be displayed.

ft-product-heading-position.label: Position 'Product name'
ft-product-heading-position.helpText:
Select whether the product name should be displayed above the "Image gallery and buy box" (default) or in the "buy box".

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, choose the 'Standard' layout.

ft-product-detail-manufacturer-logo-show.label: Show manufacturer logo
ft-product-detail-manufacturer-logo-show.helpText: Select whether the manufacturer logo should be displayed.

ft-product-detail-ordernumber-show.label: Show product number
ft-product-detail-ordernumber-show.helpText: Select whether the product number should be displayed.

ft-product-specifications.label: Product specifications
ft-product-specifications.helpText: Select which product specifications should be displayed in the buy box.

ft-social-icons.label: Social icons
ft-social-icons.helpText: Select whether social icons should be displayed in the footer contact area.

ft-snippet-field-blogger-link.label: Blogger: Link
ft-snippet-field-blogger-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Blogger profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.blogger'.

ft-snippet-field-facebook-link.label: Facebook: Link
ft-snippet-field-facebook-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Facebook profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.facebook'.

ft-snippet-field-flickr-link.label: Flickr: Link
ft-snippet-field-flickr-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Flickr profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.flickr'.

ft-snippet-field-instagram-link.label: Instagram: Link
ft-snippet-field-instagram-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Instagram profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.instagram'.

ft-snippet-field-linkedin-link.label: LinkedIn: Link
ft-snippet-field-linkedin-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your LinkedIn profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.linkedin'.

ft-snippet-field-pinterest-link.label: Pinterest: Link
ft-snippet-field-pinterest-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Pinterest profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.pinterest'.

ft-snippet-field-tiktok-link.label: TikTok: Link
ft-snippet-field-tiktok-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your TikTok profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.tiktok'.

ft-snippet-field-twitch-link.label: Twitch: Link
ft-snippet-field-twitch-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Twitch profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.twitch'.

ft-snippet-field-vimeo-link.label: Vimeo: Link
ft-snippet-field-vimeo-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Vimeo profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.vimeo'.

ft-snippet-field-whatsapp-link.label: WhatsApp: Link
ft-snippet-field-whatsapp-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your WhatsApp profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.whatsapp'.

ft-snippet-field-wordpress-link.label: WordPress: Link
ft-snippet-field-wordpress-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your WordPress profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.wordpress'.

ft-snippet-field-x-link.label: X: Link
ft-snippet-field-x-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your X profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.x'.

ft-snippet-field-xing-link.label: Xing: Link
ft-snippet-field-xing-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your Xing profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.xing'.

ft-snippet-field-youtube-link.label: YouTube: Link
ft-snippet-field-youtube-link.helpText:
Enter the url to your YouTube profile.

Note: You can edit title of the link in the snippet management (Settings > Regional > Snippets) by searching for 'freeThemeOne.socialIcons.youtube'.

blockFreeThemeEssentials.label: üéÅ FreeTheme Essentials - Free extras for more design and conversion

ft-essentials-teaser.label: Get professional Shopping Experiences, guides and tools - 100% free!
ft-essentials-teaser.helpText: Unlock exclusive extras: Import plugin with storytelling elements, step-by-step implementation guides, all graphics as editable PSD files, 100+ pagespeed-optimized shipping and payment logos, plus customizing plugins for individual adjustments (Self-hosted and Cloud). Perfect for more design quality, faster implementation and higher conversion rates.

ft-cms-styling.label: FreeTheme 'CMS Styling'
ft-cms-styling.helpText:
This configuration enables/disables the "CMS Styling".

If this configuration is active, CMS sections and blocks in default CMS layouts from Shopware are styled accordingly.

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, disable this configuration.

ft-responsive-gutter.label: FreeTheme 'Responsive Gutter'
ft-responsive-gutter.helpText:
This configuration enables/disables the "Responsive Gutter".

If this configuration is active, the spacing in CMS sections/blocks (--bs-gutter) is reduced in smaller viewports.

Note: If you experience compatibility issues with third-party extensions, disable this configuration.

ft-landingpage-styling.label: FreeTheme 'Landingpage Styling'
ft-landingpage-styling.helpText:
This configuration enables/disables CSS styles for the FreeTheme Landingpage.

Note: You can disable this configuration if you do not use the FreeTheme Landingpage.

ft-expert-mode.label: Expert mode
ft-expert-mode.helpText:
This configuration enables/disables the "Expert mode".

Tip: Deactivate the "Expert mode" to rule out errors in your custom code.

ft-custom-css-code.label: Custom CSS code
ft-custom-css-code.helpText:
These CSS code is loaded directly in the head area and should be minimized with a CSS minifier tool.

Ideally, you should add CSS code via a SCSS file, e.g. with our 'Customizing Plugin'.

Caution: This configuration can lead to errors if you enter a wrong value! Only use this if you are absolutely sure.

ft-custom-css-code-load.label: Load CSS code
ft-custom-css-code-load.helpText:
This configuration enables/disables the loading of your individual CSS code.

Deactivate this configuration if you do not want to include any CSS code or if you want to prevent your CSS code from being loaded.
